pkgmetadata.longdescription: Creating Tables of Excluded Observations // Instead of counting observations before and after a subset() call, the ExclusionTable() function reports the number before and after each subset() call together with the number of observations that have been excluded. This is especially useful in observational studies for keeping track how many observations have been excluded for each in-/ or exclusion criteria. You just need to provide ExclusionTable() with a dataset and a list of logical filter statements.
